item.title: Linus: On nautre
Vapors of Delphi
item.description: Source: TW Apollo’s sanctuary at Delphi is the stuff of legends For over a thousand years, the famous oracle foretold the futures and fortunes of the city-states and heroes of ancient Greece. This thread explores whether she was stoned on geological vapors. Set in a mountainous landscape, with a view down to the gulf of Corinth, the site at Delphi is breathtakingly beautiful. Ancient myths describe it as the center of the world, the place where Zeus’s two eagles met, each released at the opposite end of the earth.
